page.title: 04Typical School Day 1985
page.content: Today is Tuesday. Mrs. Goddard calls the register, people pay 70p a day for dinner. Today there is no Assembly so we read for 30 minutes. Maths is usually the next lesson, the 4th years use Alpha 4. We work for 30 minutes, then we have playtime. We usually play Leapfrog. Play ends at 10.50. We then have science, we take down notes and draw pictures. We have lunch at noon. I usually have crisps, sandwiches, yogurt and a drink. We then play Block. We go in at 1.15. Today we go swimming. We have a 30 minute lesson. We return to school at 2.30. At playtime I have a flute lesson. I practice scales and pieces for my exam. I return to class at 3.10 where Mr. Croft, the Curate is teaching R.I. Home time is at 3.40. By Tamara Privett 11 years
